messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] all things celtic
messages.msgSnippet: ... Sorry. Not me. I speak Welsh but don t consider that celtic . In fact, I can be found on various pagan lists ranting about the mis-use of the word celtic
messages.messageBody:
Lee Roversi wrote:

> Hello dear listmates-
>
> As always, I have a difficult time keeping up with reading all the
> wonderful posts on this active list! Thanks for all the consistent input.
>
> One thing caught my eye today - I believe it was Shyrley who mentioned that
> she had a daughter who was interested in all things Celtic, Gaelic, etc.
> Well, my son, Sky 19 years old, has a passion of the same kind. I was
> wondering how old your daughter is (perhaps irrelevant) and if she would
> like to have an email penpal with similar interests. Or, if someone else on
> the list has a child/friend/etc who might be so inclined.
>
> Email me off list, if you like.
>
> In aloha, Lee

Sorry. Not me. I speak Welsh but don't consider that 'celtic'. In fact, I can be found on various pagan lists ranting about the mis-use of the word 'celtic and scaring new-agers who think a swirly peice
of knot-work makes one 'celtic'. None who have ever read any reputable ancient history or archealogical papers. See, I'm ranting already ;-)

Shyrley, who isn't scary in real life unless you mention ley-lines or somesuch.....


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: all things celtic
messages.msgSnippet: Hello dear listmates- As always, I have a difficult time keeping up with reading all the wonderful posts on this active list! Thanks for all the consistent
messages.messageBody:
Hello dear listmates-

As always, I have a difficult time keeping up with reading all the
wonderful posts on this active list! Thanks for all the consistent input.

One thing caught my eye today - I believe it was Shyrley who mentioned that
she had a daughter who was interested in all things Celtic, Gaelic, etc.
Well, my son, Sky 19 years old, has a passion of the same kind. I was
wondering how old your daughter is (perhaps irrelevant) and if she would
like to have an email penpal with similar interests. Or, if someone else on
the list has a child/friend/etc who might be so inclined.

Email me off list, if you like.

In aloha, Lee
